page.title: 10Holidays in Crossmichael
page.content: Crossmichael is an excellent place for holidays. There are many tourists in the summer. That is when the town gets littered with chip papers. When the tourist season is over the place looks much tidier, but you still see some tourists at other times of the year when it is cheaper. There are good shops and the pub is very friendly. The Culgruff Hotel just outside Crossmichael provides ample hospitality. There is a good watersports club on the banks of Loch Ken. There is wind surfing, canoeing, and water skiing. Nearly every week there are fishing competitions. The main species of fish is trout and there are also a lot of pike and perch. The biggest pike caught in the loch is 73 lbs. They have still got its head in the Gun and Tackle Sports shop in Castle Douglas.
